title: Ep: 006 - Karl Ramsdell // Coastal Maine Photographer
description: In this episode of Architecture, Design, & Photography, we invite Karl Ramsdell to the studio for a discussion about nature photography and his experience photographing the Maine Coast. Karl shares how he managed to develop a unique perspective, a recognizable style, and an approach to photography that sets him apart from other nature photographers.
author: info@trentbell.com (Trent Bell)
